mapper.select: SELECT bameSeq, bameStationName, bameLatitude, bameLongitudel, (6371 * ACOS(COS(RADIANS(#{midpointLatitude})) * COS(RADIANS(bameLatitude)) * COS(RADIANS(bameLongitudel) - RADIANS(#{midpointLongitude})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{midpointLatitude})) * SIN(RADIANS(bameLatitude)))) AS distance FROM ba_meetpoint WHERE bameUseNy = 1 HAVING distance = 5 ORDER BY distance LIMIT 1
